sn12.17:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn12.17:1.3: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi.
sn12.17:1.4: Addasa kho acelo kassapo bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
sn12.17:1.5: Disvana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn12.17:1.6: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho acelo kassapo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.17:1.7: “puccheyyama mayam bhavantam gotamam kancideva desam, sace no bhavam gotamo okasam karoti panhassa veyyakaranaya”ti.
sn12.17:2.1: Dutiyampi kho acelo kassapo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.17:2.2: “puccheyyama mayam bhavantam gotamam kancideva desam, sace no bhavam gotamo okasam karoti panhassa veyyakaranaya”ti.
sn12.17:2.7: Evam vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.17:2.8: “na kho pana mayam bhavantam gotamam bahudeva pucchitukama”ti.
sn12.17:3.5: ‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, sayankatanca parankatanca dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:3.7: ‘Kim pana, bho gotama, asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:3.9: ‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:3.12: ‘Tena hi bhavam gotamo dukkham na janati, na passati’ti.
sn12.17:3.13: ‘Na khvaham, kassapa, dukkham na janami, na passami.
sn12.17:4.1: “Kim nu kho, bho gotama, ‘sayankatam dukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, kassapa’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.2: ‘Kim pana, bho gotama, parankatam dukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, kassapa’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.3: ‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, sayankatanca parankatanca dukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, kassapa’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.4: ‘Kim pana, bho gotama, asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, kassapa’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.5: ‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘na kho, kassapa, natthi dukkham, atthi kho, kassapa, dukkhan’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:4.6: ‘Tena hi bhavam gotamo dukkham na janati na passati’ti iti puttho samano ‘na khvaham, kassapa, dukkham na janami na passami.
sn12.17:4.9: Acikkhatu ca me, bhante, bhagava dukkham.
sn12.17:4.10: Desetu ca me, bhante, bhagava dukkhan”ti.
sn12.17:5.1: “‘So karoti so patisamvedayati’ti kho, kassapa, adito sato ‘sayankatam dukkhan’ti iti vadam sassatam etam pareti.
sn12.17:5.2: ‘Anno karoti anno patisamvedayati’ti kho, kassapa, vedanabhitunnassa sato ‘parankatam dukkhan’ti iti vadam ucchedam etam pareti.
sn12.17:5.3: Ete te, kassapa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.17:6.1: Evam vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.17:6.3: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya …pe… ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn12.17:6.4: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn12.17:6.5: Labheyyaham, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
sn12.17:7.1: “Yo kho, kassapa, annatitthiyapubbo imasmim dhammavinaye akankhati pabbajjam, akankhati upasampadam, so cattaro mase parivasati. Catunnam masanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajenti upasampadenti bhikkhubhavaya.
sn12.17:8.1: “Sace, bhante, annatitthiyapubbo imasmim dhammavinaye akankhati pabbajjam, akankhati upasampadam, cattaro mase parivasati. Catunnam masanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajenti upasampadenti bhikkhubhavaya. Aham cattari vassani parivasissami, catunnam vassanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajentu upasampadentu bhikkhubhavaya”ti.
sn12.17:9.1: Alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
sn12.17:9.2: Acirupasampanno ca panayasma kassapo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn12.17:9.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn12.17:9.4: Annataro ca panayasma kassapo arahatam ahositi.
